Host a Private Event at Brix & Mortar
Enjoy our wine bar all to yourself - no rental fee, just a bar tab minimum.
Order from our menu of small plates or bring your own food, music, and decor
No venue fee - just a bar tab minimum
How it Works
You'll have the full Brix & Mortar wine bar to yourself for a private event. We run things just like we do during normal hours - except it's all for you and your guests.
We serve beer and wine by the glass during private events - wine flights and bottles of wine are not available.
FAQs
Can I bring food?
Yes! You're welcome to bring your own food, cake, or catering.
Is there a rental fee?
Nope. Just meet the bar minimum for your time slot.
How Many guests can I invite?
Each location varies, but we'll help you figure out what works.
Can I decorate?
Absolutely!
Do you serve wine flights or bottles?
Private events are by-the-glass only.
Check Availability
Fill out the form below and our team will be in touch to confirm details and help you plan the perfect event.
